extendedInfo.description: What triggered the Trojan War? Did you know that at Thermopylae only 299 Spartans died, not 300? Which famous philosopher was Alexander the Greatâs tutor?Show how much you know and learn with Genius - History of Greece! Discover the history of ancient Greece, the cradle of our culture, from its legendary origins in Crete, Troy and Mycenae, to the glory of classical Athens and the empire of Alexander the Great.Answer the questions correctly and learn about the key political, cultural and artistic events in a civilization that created philosophy, democracy and classical art.â¢ The origins of Greek culture: Minoans and Mycenaeansâ¢ The birth of the polisâ¢ Athens and the classical eraâ¢ Alexander the Great and the Hellenistic worldâ¢ Greek MythologyIn the answer to each question, you will find an explanation rich in interesting information that will allow you to learn about the History of ancient Greece while having fun.â¢ Test your knowledgeâ¢ Learn with the detailed explanations for each answerâ¢ Share questions and answers with your friendsâ¢ Excel in each level so you become a PentakosiomedimnoiWith Genius â History of Greece, learning becomes a game.Discover it.
